areas.infoMenubar: CBS gegevens van de geselecteerde gemeente,wijk of buurt

areas.query:
prefix geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
prefix imx:<http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#>
prefix imx-ext: <https://modellen.kkg.kadaster.nl/def/imxgeo-ext#>


select distinct ?property ?value
where
{
  { ?obj imx-ext:regio <{{buurt}}> .filter ("{{keuze}}"="buurt")}
  union
  { ?obj imx-ext:regio <{{wijk}}> .filter ("{{keuze}}"="wijk")}
  union
  { ?obj imx-ext:regio <{{gemeente}}> .filter ("{{keuze}}"="gemeente")}
        
 
          ?obj ?pred ?value.
            filter (ISLITERAL(?value))
            bind (STRAFTER(STR(?pred),"#") as ?property1)
            filter (?value!="-99999999")
            filter (strstarts(?property1,"aantal_bedrijven_"))
             bind (replace(?property1,"aantal_bedrijven_","") as ?property)

}

prefix geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
prefix imx:<http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#>
prefix imx-ext: <https://modellen.kkg.kadaster.nl/def/imxgeo-ext#>

select distinct ?property ?value
where
{ 
  { ?obj imx-ext:regio <{{buurt}}> .filter ("{{keuze}}"="buurt")}
  union
  { ?obj imx-ext:regio <{{wijk}}> .filter ("{{keuze}}"="wijk")}
  union
  { ?obj imx-ext:regio <{{gemeente}}> .filter ("{{keuze}}"="gemeente")}
          ?obj ?pred ?value.
            filter (ISLITERAL(?value))
            bind (STRAFTER(STR(?pred),"#") as ?property1)
            filter (?value!="-99999999")
            filter (strstarts(?property1,"percentage_personen_"))
            bind (replace(?property1,"percentage_personen_","") as ?property)

  
}

areas.infoMenubar: Interactieve kaart. Selecteer een gebouw, bouwwerk of perceel
adres gegevens van het geselecteerde object
evt beperkingen op het geselecteerde perceel of bouwwerk
Algemene kenmerken van het geselecteerd object
areas.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
prefix geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
prefix imx:<http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#>
prefix imx-ext: <https://modellen.kkg.kadaster.nl/def/imxgeo-ext#>


select distinct ?property ?value ?literal ?pred
where
{
  
  {
     <{{selection}}> a/rdfs:label ?value.
    bind ("type" as ?property)
    bind ("true" as ?literal)
    bind (rdf:type as ?pred)
   
  }
  union
  {
     
  <{{selection}}> ?pred ?value.
    bind (STR(ISLITERAL(?value)) as ?literal)
   # filter (?literal=true)
            filter (?value!="-99999999")
  ?pred rdfs:label ?property.
    optional {?pred rdfs:comment ?beschrijving}
  filter (?property not in ("domein","identificatie"))
  
 # bind (coalesce(?label,?property2) as ?property)
  }
 
}

prefix geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
prefix imx:<http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#>

select distinct  ?label  ?uri 
where
{
        
           ?uri a imx:Gemeentegebied.
           ?uri imx:naam ?label.
   
}

areas.infoMenubar: Interactieve kaart. Selecteer een gebouw, bouwwerk of perceel

areas.query:
prefix geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
prefix imx:<http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#>
prefix imx-ext: <https://modellen.kkg.kadaster.nl/def/imxgeo-ext#>


select distinct?status (count(distinct ?uri) as ?aantal)
where
{
  
   <{{buurt2}}> imx:bevatPerceel/^imx:bevindtZichOpPerceel ?uri.
    ?uri <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#status> ?status.
  filter (?status!="bestaand")
  filter (?status!="Pand in gebruik")
    
    
}
  group by ?status
areas.infoMenubar: aantallen mbt status zonder "bestaand" en "Pand in gebruik"

areas.query:
prefix imxgeo: <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#>
prefix geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>

select ?label ?uri  where 
{
  ?uri a <https://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#Beperking>.
  ?uri <https://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#identificatie> ?label

}

prefix geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
prefix imx:<http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#>

select distinct  ?label  ?uri 
where
{
        
           ?uri a imx:Gemeentegebied.
           ?uri imx:naam ?label.
   
}

prefix imxgeo: <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#>
prefix geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
select distinct ?uri ?geometry ?color ?label 
where {
 
 
  ?uri imxgeo:isBeperkingOpPerceel/imxgeo:ligtInRegistratieveRuimte <{{gemeente}}>.
      
      ?uri imxgeo:registratiegegevens ?reg.
      filter not exists {?reg <https://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#eindGeldigheid> []}
  ?uri geo:hasGeometry/geo:asWKT ?geometry.
?uri <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#grondslagcode> ?color.
   ?uri <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#grondslag> ?label

  
} 
#title: PB en gekoppelde percelen

areas.titleMenubar: Geselecteerde publiekrechtelijke beperking en bijbehorend percelen

areas.extendquery:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>


select distinct *


where

{

  

  bind ( <{{uri}}>  as ?node)

    

    optional {?node rdfs:label|skos:prefLabel ?nodeLabel2.}


 bind (STRBEFORE(STR(?node),"#") as ?btext)

 bind (IF(?btext="",REPLACE(STR(?node),'([^/]+$)',""),?btext) as ?nodeType)

    bind (IF(BOUND(?nodeLabel2),?nodeLabel2, ?nodeType) as ?nodeLabel)



    ?node ?edge ?object.


  filter (!ISBLANK(?object))

  filter(!ISLITERAL(?object))



bind (STRBEFORE(STR(?object),"#") as ?botext)

 bind (IF(?botext="",REPLACE(STR(?object),'([^/]+$)',""),?botext) as ?objectType)


   

  bind (REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?edge),"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#","rdfs:"),"http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#","rdf:"),"http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#","skos:"),"http://www.rws.nl/abdl#","abdl:") as ?edgeLabel)

    optional {?object rdfs:label|skos:prefLabel ?olabel. } 

    bind (if (BOUND(?olabel),?olabel, ?object) as ?objectLabel2)


 bind (REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?objectLabel2),"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#","rdfs:"),"http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#","rdf:"),"http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#","skos:"),"http://www.rws.nl/abdl#","abdl:"),"https://bimloket.nl/data/kernmodel/thesaurus#","cbnl:") as ?objectLabel)




}
    
    limit 40
areas.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>


select distinct *


where

{

  

  bind ( <{{dmselectie}}>  as ?node)

    

    optional {?node rdfs:label|skos:prefLabel ?nodeLabel2.}


 bind (STRBEFORE(STR(?node),"#") as ?btext)

 bind (IF(?btext="",REPLACE(STR(?node),'([^/]+$)',""),?btext) as ?nodeType)

    bind (IF(BOUND(?nodeLabel2),?nodeLabel2, ?nodeType) as ?nodeLabel)



    ?node ?edge ?object.


  filter (!ISBLANK(?object))

  filter(!ISLITERAL(?object))



bind (STRBEFORE(STR(?object),"#") as ?botext)

 bind (IF(?botext="",REPLACE(STR(?object),'([^/]+$)',""),?botext) as ?objectType)


   

  bind (REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?edge),"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#","rdfs:"),"http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#","rdf:"),"http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#","skos:"),"http://www.rws.nl/abdl#","abdl:") as ?edgeLabel)

    optional {?object rdfs:label|skos:prefLabel ?olabel. } 

    bind (if (BOUND(?olabel),?olabel, ?object) as ?objectLabel2)


 bind (REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?objectLabel2),"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#","rdfs:"),"http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#","rdf:"),"http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#","skos:"),"http://www.rws.nl/abdl#","abdl:"),"https://bimloket.nl/data/kernmodel/thesaurus#","cbnl:") as ?objectLabel)




}
    
    limit 40
